text:
prAqNairEqva praqyanti# prAqNairudya#nti daSaqmE&ha#n gRuhyantE prAqNA vai prA#NagraqhAH prAqNEByaqH Kaluq vA Eqtat praqjA ya#ntiq yadvA#madEqvyaM ~MyOnEqScyava#tE daSaqmE&ha#n. vAmadEqvyaM ~MyOnE$ScyavatEq 
yad-da#SaqmE&ha#n gRuqhyantE$ prAqNEBya# Eqva tat praqjA naya#nti || 31
(tat - prA#NagraqhAH - saqptavi(gm)#Sacca) (A10)
